title: Recursion [2]
description:
This will be significantly easier.

CBit OS needs another math functino. they need you to create a function called sumTo(int a, int save)(save will always be 0. it is to be used to recurse) that is like factorial but for addition. so sumto 9 = 9 + 8 + 7 + 6 + 5 + 4 + 3 + 2 + 1. but for 0 the output is just 0.
